title: This Week's Top Stories - Russian Attack Near Poland, Kanye West Harassing Kim Kardashian & More
itunes:title: This Week's Top Stories - Russian Attack Near Poland, Kanye West Harassing Kim Kardashian & More
description:
Russia bombs a Ukrainian base near Poland's border, Trevor examines Kanye West's harassment of Kim Kardashian, and Ukraine President Volodymyr Zelenskyy gives a speech to Congress.
